covata.rovers

Class FileUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • covata.rovers.FileUtilities

  • public class FileUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    The class FileUtilities provides methods to read and load files.
    Author:
    ceven

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • loadFile

        public static java.io.File loadFile(boolean askUserInput)
        Load a file. May ask for user input, or load a default file.
        Parameters:
        askUserInput - whether the user should be able to enter a file path manually.
        Returns:
        a File. If the user is prompted to enter a file path and the path is valid, then this file is returned. Otherwise, a file with path DEFAULT_INPUT_FILE_PATH is returned.

      • readFile

        public static java.lang.String readFile(java.io.File f)
        Reads a file and converts its content into a string, where each line is separated by \n.
        Parameters:
        f - the file to be read
        Returns:
        a string containing the input information, where each line of the input is separated by \n
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the file is determined as invalid by the method isValidFile(File) or if a syntax error is encountered

      • isValidFile

        public static boolean isValidFile(java.io.File f)
        Checks if a file in parameter is valid. A file is valid if it is not null, exists and is a normal file.
        Parameters:
        f - the files to check
        Returns:
        true if f is not null, exists and is a file, false otherwise
